name: Mega Construction Mountain Drill Crane Operator 3D Game
name_original: Mega Construction Mountain Drill Crane Operator 3D Game
description:
Gear up to play 1st ever rock saw mega crane game in apple mobile and tablets.

How to Play:
Drive various kinds of construction cranes, drill crane, saw crane and excavator.
Crush, demolish and cut the rocky terrain on hillside with mega cranes.
Operate excavator crane to dump all rocky material into dumper truck.
Drive heavy dumper truck on treacherous hilly path without colliding or falling in drench.
Dump all rubble material to safe zone to make path in the hilly area.


Download 1st ever saw crane construction crane game with real physics and amazing gameplay like never before.
